Dear friends,

I’m back in NY. It’s warm. It’s nice.

The movie ALLURE directed by Vladan Nikolic, in which I appear, got a pretty cool NY Times review, check it out. It is still screening at the Quad Cinema until this Thursday March 12.

Also Björk’s exhibit at MoMA opened this week, time to get out of your comfort zone ;)

Be well and see you soon!
